Title: The Theater Troupe
Description:
Since you're an honorary member of the theater troupe, $n, what do you think about playing a part in our plays?

No big parts--I don't want to upset the rest of the troupe by taking away their limelight. You know how they are.

Are you available, say, once a week?
ObjectivesText: Participate in the Theater Troupe event.
RewardText:
Marbleous! You're the perfect addition to our theater troupe, $n.

Please come and help us again in our next showing!
